abstract: European Union regulators said Friday that they have extended until Jan. 27 a deadline to wrap up their antitrust review of Oracle’s planned $7.4 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems.
snippet: European Union regulators said Friday that they have extended until Jan. 27 a deadline to wrap up their antitrust review of Oracle’s planned $7.4 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems.
lead_paragraph: European Union regulators said Friday that they have extended until Jan. 27 a deadline to wrap up their antitrust review of Oracle‘s planned $7.4 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: E.U. Takes More Time to Review Oracle-Sun Deal
